original_text: Mostly good, but a couple huge problems. 1 - it has to "check inventory" when you click size or color on clothing, a useless thing the website doesn't do, and it sometimes fails to load after. 2 - you can't see order details, clicking on an order goes straight to the shipping tracking, you must go to the website. The purpose of an app is to create a form that works on a vertical display. It should function the exact same way as the website. This app fails that basic requirement.
